# cleanR

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of cleanR is to provide some functionalists that can facilitate data cleaning.

## Installation

You can install the development version of cleanR from GitHub with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
remotes::install_github("axmedmaxamuud/cleanR")
```

## Examples

### Create blank logbook

This is a basic example of creating a blank logbook that you can use it later to save the observation with issues. 

```{r example}
library(cleanR)

my_logbook <- logbook()

```
